data.text: Ku zo, bari mu rera don farin ciki ga Ubangiji;
Bari mu zo gabansa da godiya
Gama Ubangiji Allah mai girma ne,
A hannunsa ne zurfafan duniya suke,
Teku nasa ne, gama shi ne ya yi shi,
Ku zo, bari mu rusuna mu yi sujada,
“Kada ku taurare zukatanku kamar yadda kuka yi a Meriba,95.8 Meriba yana nufin faɗa.
inda kakanninku suka gwada suka kuma jarraba ni,
Shekara arba’in na yi fushi da wancan tsara;
Saboda haka na yi rantsuwa cikin fushina,
